page.title: 02Employment in Bangor
page.content: Bangor is unusual in being a city with very little industry.In the past the slate quarries provided employment for many of the inhabitants. The main source of employment these days is education.The{University {College of North Wales,}founded over 100 years ago, dominates Bangor both physically and as an employer.Other employers in this field are the{Normal {College}and the{Technical College. Another large employer is the new district hospital,{Ysbyty Gwynedd.}It opened about a year ago replacing the old{Caernarfonshire and Anglesey {Hospital}in Upper Bangor.On the outskirts of the city there is a small industrial estate which houses several small factories. This is, however , an area of high unemployment.
